nodes.text: The Mestani sector was a sector in the galaxy established at some point before the war against Zakuul in 3630 BBY. During that year, Theron Shan of the Anti-Zakuul Alliance visited the sector while securing military allies for the fight against the Eternal Empire of Zakuul.
Mestani sector is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire Chapter 14: Mandalore the Avenger.
